txt.en: Barad Nemorn is located near where the Morgulduin meets the Anduin in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should destroy statues of the Dark Lord at Barad Nemorn to strike a blow to the camp's morale.
Barad Nemorn: Statues of the Dark Lord
The Morgul forces have constructed crude statues of Sauron, which should be taken down to reduce the camp's morale.
You have destroyed many statues of the Dark Lord and have lowered the morale of the Morgul forces at Barad Nemorn.
Barad Nemorn is located near where the Morgulduin meets the Anduin in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should destroy statues of the Dark Lord at Barad Nemorn to strike a blow to the camp's morale.
Crudely constructed statues of Sauron dot the Morgul encampment. You believe destroying the statues will reduce morale throughout the encampment.
Destroy statues of Sauron at Barad Nemorn
